description:
The main Gift Game to celebrate the Rise of the Fire Dragon will be Ayesha Ignis Fatuus of Will-O-Wisp and Kasukabe You of the No-Names.  Before the end of the celebration the prophecy will come true.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il paraît qu`une calamité noire va apparaître au son de la flûte ?
It Seems That a Great Disaster Will Come with the Playing of a Flute?
Kuroi Kyouji wa Fue no Oto to Tomo ni Kuru Sou Desu yo?
黒い凶事は笛の音と共に来るそうですよ?
